text: Marle may refer to: * Marle (Chrono Trigger), a character from the 1995 video game Chrono Trigger * Marle, Aisne, a commune in France * Marle, a hamlet in the Dutch municipality of Olst-Wijhe * Marle, a hamlet in the Dutch municipality of Hellendoorn == See also == * Marl (disambiguation)
title: Marle
